/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the water, connecting two parts of the city. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
